ai_engineering: Expertise in building production-ready AI systems, including agentic AI, machine learning integration, and turning AI experiments into reliable business features.
software_engineering: Full-stack software development expertise across multiple languages and frameworks (Java, .NET, Node.js, Python, React, Angular) with focus on scalable, maintainable enterprise solutions.
quality_engineering: Comprehensive QA services including manual and automated testing, test strategy development, and continuous quality assurance throughout the development lifecycle.
product_management: Strategic product planning, user research, feature prioritization, and product discovery to ensure development efforts align with business goals and user needs.
identity_access_management: Specialized expertise in identity and access management solutions, including Okta integration, SSO, MFA, and security compliance for enterprise applications.
cloud_devops: Cloud-native architecture, DevOps automation, CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and deployment to major cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) with Kubernetes expertise.
bpm_solutions: Business Process Management using Camunda BPM platform for workflow automation, process orchestration, and business process modeling (BPMN 2.0).
iot_solutions: Custom IoT development for real-time location tracking, monitoring systems, sensor integration, and IoT platform development for industrial and safety-critical applications.
